revised_title: A Description of the Skull and Skeleton of a Peculiarly Modified Rupicaprine Antelope (Myotragus balearicus, Bate)
tldr: The author examines the skull and skeleton of the Myotragus balearicus, a peculiarly modified rupicaprine antelope, found in the Balearic Islands. The article provides a detailed description of the skull's structure and compares it with other related forms, aiming to determine its affinities and understand its unique features.
